Container.Name: KitchenOwl-Web
Container.Overview: This is the WebUI for the KitchenOwl Container. You will also need the KitchenOwl Container for this to work. KitchenOwl is a self-hosted grocery list and recipe manager. The backend is made with Flask and the frontend with Flutter. Easily add items to your shopping list before you go shopping. You can also create recipes and add items based on what you want to cook.

Config.Name: Url to the Backend (needs kitchenowl container)
Config.Description: Url to the Backend (needs kitchenowl container)

Config.Name: JWT Secret (CHANGE THIS!)
Config.Description: For security reasons, it is mandatory to change the JWT Secret! Preferably use a secure random key generator for that.
